title: Boska Holland Stainless Steel Soft Cheese Knife, Slim Blade for Brie, 10 Year Guarantee, Monaco Collection
features: NO STICKING: The narrow blade has less surface area for cheese to stick to
IDEAL FOR: Soft (and sticky) cheeses such as Brie and Camembert
EUROPEAN DESIGN: 100% stainless steel, cast in one piece
10 YEAR GUARANTEE: High quality materials and expert manufacturing mean that Boska can offer you the best possible products
description: You think cutting soft cheese is a sticky affair? Not with this stainless steel designer knife. A narrower blade implies a lower chance of sticking. More enjoyment!
The narrow blade has less surface area for cheese to stick to
Soft (and sticky) cheeses such as Brie and Camembert
100% stainless steel, cast in one piece
This sleek and stylish knife is best suited to cutting soft cheeses. Try it out on cheeses like Brie, Camembert, Taleggio, and Humboldt Fog!

Every cheese deserves its own knife, because cheese varies so much in its properties and structure. With the right knife, it only gets easier, and the cheese experience gets even better. Take, for example, this Brie Knife. The narrow blade has less surface area, so the cheese has less ‘knife’ to stick to. This means you’ll slice through soft and sticky cheeses much more smoothly and easily.
This knife is dishwasher safe, however we do recommend that you hand wash this tool so it stays sharp - just like all high quality knives.

Boska Holland works hard to procure materials of the highest quality and produce its products through expert manufacturing. We're proud of our cheese tools and believe they will stand the test of time, so we offer you a 10 year guarantee on this product.

We love cheese! Since 1896, here at Boska, it's been our mission to spread the love of cheese to everyone everywhere. Our innovative family-owned company started as a blacksmith making tools for the cheese farmers in Holland, and now we are the world's only specialist in Cheesewares: cheese tools and accessories. In short: we sell everything you need to enjoy cheese except the cheese itself!
